Make sure that you are using the latest: Make sure that you are using the latest version of Lisk Hub.
An error occurred while creating the tra: An error occurred while creating the transaction.
An error occurred while registering as d: An error occurred while registering as delegate.
An error occurred while registering your: An error occurred while registering your second passphrase. Please try again.
Are you sure to confirm this selection?: Are you sure to confirm this selection?
Becoming a delegate requires registratio: Becoming a delegate requires registration. You may choose your own delegate name, which can be used to promote your delegate. Only the top 101 delegates are eligible to forge. All fees are shared equally between the top 101 delegates.
Change account settings, enable delegate: Change account settings, enable delegate voting and repeat the onboarding here.
Click here to go to the main page of Lis: Click here to go to the main page of Lisk Hub and find all relevant statistics and ID information
Click here to transfer funds between Lis: Click here to transfer funds between Lisk IDs and access your transaction history.
Confirm to register your second passphra: Confirm to register your second passphrase on the blockchain.
Create a Lisk ID to gain access to all s: Create a Lisk ID to gain access to all services.
Currently we speaking english and german: Currently we speaking english and german.
Entered passphrase does not belong to th: Entered passphrase does not belong to the active account
Failed to connect: Node {{address}} is n: Failed to connect: Node {{address}} is not active
Go to \"More\" on your Sidebar to start: Go to "More" on your Sidebar to start the onboarding whenever you need.
Here you see your address and balance. Y: Here you see your address and balance. You can click your account avatar to see all your saved IDs.
I am responsible for keeping my passphra: I am responsible for keeping my passphrase safe. No one can reset it, not even Lisk.
It is recommended that you initialize yo: It is recommended that you initialize your Lisk ID.
Learn more about Lisk ID initialization: Learn more about Lisk ID initialization
Maximum of {{maxcount}} votes at a time: Maximum of {{maxcount}} votes at a time

Please click Next, then move around your: Please click Next, then move around your mouse randomly to generate a random passphrase.
Please go back and check your passphrase: Please go back and check your passphrase again.
Please sign in with your first passphras: Please sign in with your first passphrase
Quickly send and request LSK token: Quickly send and request LSK token
Register and oversee your decentralized: Register and oversee your decentralized application here. Available soon.
Search for Lisk ID or Transaction ID: Search for Lisk ID or Transaction ID
Secure the use of your Lisk ID with a se: Secure the use of your Lisk ID with a second passphrase.
Select the missing words to confirm: Select the missing words to confirm
Sidechains will revolutionize the way de: Sidechains will revolutionize the way decentralised apps are developed. Here you will be able to find hosts, and monitor your sidechains soon.
Take a quick tour to see how the Lisk Hu: Take a quick tour to see how the Lisk Hub works.
Take a tour to see how it works. It shou: Take a tour to see how it works. It should not take longer than 5 minutes
The Wallet will show your recent transac: The Wallet will show your recent transactions.
The download was started. Depending on y: The download was started. Depending on your internet speed it can take up to several minutes. You will be informed then it is finished and prompted to restart the app.
The easiest way to do this is to send LS: The easiest way to do this is to send LSK to yourself. It will cost you only the usual {{fee}} LSK transaction fee.
There is a new version ({{version}}) ava: There is a new version ({{version}}) available, do you want to update now?
This process should take only 10 seconds: This process should take only 10 seconds but may take up to 15 minutes.
Transaction is being processed and will: Transaction is being processed and will be confirmed. It may take up to 15 minutes to be secured in the blockchain.
Unable to connect to the node: Unable to connect to the node
Updates downloaded, application has to b: Updates downloaded, application has to be restarted to apply the updates.
View all the transactions happening on t: View all the transactions happening on the Lisk Network in real time. Search for addresses and transactions.
View forging delegates and vote for the: View forging delegates and vote for the ones you support.
You are looking into a saved account. In: You are looking into a saved account. In order to {{nextAction}} you need to enter your passphrase.
You can also press ↲ enter to search: You can also press ↲ enter to search
You can always get it back.
You can select up to {{count}} delegates: You can select up to {{count}} delegates in one voting turn.
You can vote for up to {{count}} delegat: You can vote for up to {{count}} delegates in total.

You can now use Lisk Hub.
If you want to repeat the onboarding, navigate to "More" on the sidebar.

You have already registered as a delegat: You have already registered as a delegate.
You only need to do this once for each L: You only need to do this once for each Lisk ID.
You will need it to use your Lisk ID, li: You will need it to use your Lisk ID, like sending and voting. You are responsible for keeping your second passphrase safe. No one can restore it, not even Lisk.
You will send a small amount of {{fee}}: You will send a small amount of {{fee}} LSK to yourself and therefore initialize your ID.
Your passphrase is used to access your L: Your passphrase is used to access your Lisk ID.
Your registration is secured on the bloc: Your registration is secured on the blockchain.
Your second passphrase registration is b: Your second passphrase registration is being processed and will be confirmed.
You’re votes are being processed and wil: You’re votes are being processed and will be confirmed. It may take up to 10 minutes to be secured in the blockchain.
